summary: Turning Coffee into Code: Crafting Full-Stack Magic from Front-End Fun to Back-End Brilliance!

aboutme: I’m a dynamic Full Stack Web Developer with a flair for crafting interactive and responsive web applications. My expertise spans a robust tech stack including JavaScript, React, Next.js, Angular, Redux, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, GraphQL, TypeScript, and more. From mastering front-end magic with HTML and CSS to powering backend brilliance with Node.js and MongoDB, I’m adept at using a diverse range of tools like Playwright, Azure DevOps, and Power Apps. A fast learner and a collaborative team player, I thrive on expanding my skill set and driving innovative projects. Let’s create extraordinary applications together!
letsConnect: I’m actively exploring new opportunities and my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question, want to brainstorm, or simply feel like saying hi, I’m here and excited to connect. I’m passionate about collaborating with fellow developers, tech enthusiasts, and innovative minds. If you’ve got a project idea or just want to chat about the latest in web development, I am here. Let’s make something extraordinary together! Reach out via LinkedIn, GitHub, or Email. I look forward to connecting and creating something amazing with you!
